name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Workable Extension - email and resume finder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find accurate email addresses, phone numbers and resumes. Get rich candidate profiles in seconds and improve your talent sourcing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Workable Chrome Extension transforms candidate sourcing:
1. Source candidates directly via LinkedIn: Browse candidates in LinkedIn and add them in Workable jobs with one click!
2. Search for candidate profiles in Workable: Perform searches based on names and social profile URLs, to scan Workable's candidate profiles and add them directly in a any job.

Transform your candidate sourcing strategy:
Workable customers can download and use Workable Extension. You'll receive limited monthly usage for free, and for unlimited use, we offer a paid upgrade to a Recruiter License.

Right-click search: highlight any name online and right click. Choose "Workable Extension" from the contextual menu.
Social media sourcing: find any profile on LinkedIn, Twitter, Github, Dribbble or Behance.

Clip profiles straight to the talent pipeline for a job or download profiles as a PDF.
